author: CT Phipps
description:
Eldritch Prisoners, edited by David Hambling is the sixth volume of the Books of Cthulhu series. John DeLaughter, Matthew Davenport, and David Conyers all contribute stories to this tale of various horrifying situations where our protagonists are imprisoned by forces of cosmic horror.  Eldritch Prisoners‘ stories are connected by a loose narrative but really function […]

The post REVIEW: Eldritch Prisoners ed. by David Hambling appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Eldritch Prisoners ed. by David Hambling
